Welcome to the pwndevils website!

Welcome to the pwndevils, a hacking club located at Arizona State University. We are active in the CTF community, and have competitions every weekends. We play CTF as Shellphish, one of the oldest hacking collectives in the United States. Join our discord below to learn more!
